programme.title: The White, the Yellow, and the Black
programme.desc: In the 19th century, when the Japanese Emperor sends a gift pony to the US President it gets stolen and ransomed by Indians but Sheriff Gideon aided by an inept Japanese servant offers to deliver the ransom.

programme.title: Murder Obsession
programme.desc: Michael Stanford, a promising young actor, suffers from the stress caused by his job. Fatigue creates large gaps in his memory and makes him unstable character-wise. Therefore, Michael decides to retreat to his mother's house, inviting the entire film crew as well.

programme.title: The Executioner of Venice
programme.desc: In Venice,during the Inquisition,Sandrigo Bembo,the son of the Doge Giovanni Bembo,is falsely accused of treason out of pure malice by the Grand Inquisitor Rodrigo Zeno.

programme.title: La figlia di Lady Chatterly
programme.desc: La figlia di Lady Chatterly explores forbidden love in the countryside, where passions run deep.

programme.title: Champagne in paradise
programme.desc: A group of friends experiences a life-changing journey filled with humor, romance, and life lessons.

programme.title: The White, the Yellow, and the Black
programme.desc: In the 19th century, when the Japanese Emperor sends a gift pony to the US President it gets stolen and ransomed by Indians but Sheriff Gideon aided by an inept Japanese servant offers to deliver the ransom.

programme.title: Go for it
programme.desc: Two men meet in a strange situation and end up being mistaken first for robbers, then for Secret Service agents.

programme.title: The Bloodstained Shadow
programme.desc: The body of a schoolgirl is found in a meadow. The murderer is never caught, and years later, a young man named Stefano returns to the island and is reunited with his brother, the local priest.

programme.title: Ready to fight
programme.desc: Deceit, betrayal, and treachery unfold in the dangerous underworld of currency smugglers.
